languages.text: "Господин Вайс много говорил о рисках, и я воочию убедилась, как требователен к мастерству и силе духа этот обряд. Однако я уверена, что польза, которую с его помощью можно извлечь, стоит всех опасностей. А для искушенного ума такой ритуал и вовсе кладезь возможностей".

traits.locale_text: "Господин Вайс много говорил о рисках, и я воочию убедилась, как требователен к мастерству и силе духа этот обряд. Однако я уверена, что польза, которую с его помощью можно извлечь, стоит всех опасностей. А для искушенного ума такой ритуал и вовсе кладезь возможностей".

languages.text: "Master Weisz has spoken at length about the risks, and I have seen first-hand the level of skill and stamina the rite demands. But I am certain that the benefits we may derive from it are worth all the dangers. And for a discerning mind, such a ritual presents a treasure trove of possibilities."
languages.original_text: "Господин Вайс много говорил о рисках, и я воочию убедилась, как требователен к мастерству и силе духа этот обряд. Однако я уверена, что польза, которую с его помощью можно извлечь, стоит всех опасностей. А для искушенного ума такой ритуал и вовсе кладезь возможностей".

But I am certain that the benefits we may derive from it are worth all the dangers. And for a discerning mind, such a ritual presents a treasure trove of possibilities."

"Master Weisz has spoken at length about the risks, and I have seen first-hand the level of skill and stamina the rite demands. But I am certain that the benefits we may derive from it are worth all the dangers. And for a discerning mind, such a ritual presents a treasure trove of possibilities."

"Master Weisz has spoken at length about the risks, and I have seen first-hand the level of skill and stamina the rite demands. But I am certain that the benefits we may derive from it are worth all the dangers. And for a discerning mind, such a ritual presents a treasure trove of possibilities."

languages.text: «El maestro Weisz ha explicado en detalle los riesgos, y yo he comprobado personalmente el nivel de habilidad y entereza que requiere el rito. Aun así, estoy convencida de que los beneficios que podemos obtener de él están a la altura del peligro. Y, para una mente perceptiva, un ritual de este calibre supone un raudal de posibilidades».
languages.original_text: "Master Weisz has spoken at length about the risks, and I have seen first-hand the level of skill and stamina the rite demands. But I am certain that the benefits we may derive from it are worth all the dangers. And for a discerning mind, such a ritual presents a treasure trove of possibilities."

languages.text: 「ワイズ様はその危険性について詳しくお話くださいましたし、この儀式に必要な技量や体力の高さを実際に見てきました。ですが、そこから得られるかもしれない利益は、あらゆる危険に見合うものだと確信しています。そして、見識のある方にとっては、このような儀式は可能性の宝庫となるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Master Weisz has spoken at length about the risks, and I have seen first-hand the level of skill and stamina the rite demands. But I am certain that the benefits we may derive from it are worth all the dangers. And for a discerning mind, such a ritual presents a treasure trove of possibilities."

languages.text: “威茨大师已经详细揭示了这场仪式可能会带来的风险，我也亲眼看到了举行这样的仪式需要何种程度的技术与耐力。不过我很确信，这场仪式带来的好处值得我们冒这个险。对思维敏锐的人而言，这样的仪式不啻于一座宝库，充满了各种各样的可能性。”
languages.original_text: "Master Weisz has spoken at length about the risks, and I have seen first-hand the level of skill and stamina the rite demands. But I am certain that the benefits we may derive from it are worth all the dangers. And for a discerning mind, such a ritual presents a treasure trove of possibilities."

languages.text: "Meister Weisz hat sich umfassend über die Risiken geäußert und ich habe mit eigenen Augen gesehen, welches Maß an Geschick und Ausdauer der Ritus erfordert. Aber ich bin sicher, die Vorteile, die wir daraus ziehen werden, rechtfertigen alle Gefahren. Und einem scharfen Verstand bietet ein derartiges Ritual eine Fülle von Möglichkeiten."
languages.original_text: "Master Weisz has spoken at length about the risks, and I have seen first-hand the level of skill and stamina the rite demands. But I am certain that the benefits we may derive from it are worth all the dangers. And for a discerning mind, such a ritual presents a treasure trove of possibilities."

languages.text: « Maître Weisz a longuement évoqué les dangers du rituel, et j'ai vu de mes propres yeux le niveau de compétence et d'endurance qu'il exige. Mais il ne fait aucun doute que les avantages que nous pourrons en tirer valent la peine de prendre le risque. Et pour un esprit averti, un tel rituel ouvre un monde de possibilités. »
languages.original_text: "Master Weisz has spoken at length about the risks, and I have seen first-hand the level of skill and stamina the rite demands. But I am certain that the benefits we may derive from it are worth all the dangers. And for a discerning mind, such a ritual presents a treasure trove of possibilities."

languages.text: "Üstat Weisz, risklere dair uzun uzadıya konuşmuştu. Ben de ayinin ne seviyede yetenek ve takate gerek duyduğunu ilk elden gördüm. Ancak ayinin kazandıracağı faydaların tüm tehlikeye değeceğinden eminim. Ayrıca böylesi bir ayin, müşkülpesent kişiler için olasılıklarla dolu bir hazine teşkil eder."
languages.original_text: "Master Weisz has spoken at length about the risks, and I have seen first-hand the level of skill and stamina the rite demands. But I am certain that the benefits we may derive from it are worth all the dangers. And for a discerning mind, such a ritual presents a treasure trove of possibilities."
